#Peer-graded Assignment: Exploratory Course Project 1

This is my week 1 project for Exploratory Data Analysis.

*Dataset:*

* Electric power consumption from UC Irvine Machine Learning Repository https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/exdata%2Fdata%2Fhousehold_power_consumption.zip.

*Data Handling:*

* Subset data frame was created for observations between 2007-02-01 and 2007-02-02.
* Create date/time variable from Date and Time columns

##Files in this repo
* Scripts for plots 1 - 4
* PNG files of plots 1 - 4[^1]
